title: Make new skin !!!
body: I was hoping if you guys could make another Kayn skin ... im getting kinda bored with a Soul stealer Kayn and with a Mast 7 on kayn i crave for a waaaaay bad a** skin on him no matter the price but still

replies.body:
Oooooh man, my boi Kayn really does need a new skin. I think Blood Moon Kayn would be preeeeetty sick. 

Make sure you post this over in [**Concept & Creations**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) so more people will see your idea!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fxJI8ETG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-17T21:19:16.143+0000)
>
> Oooooh man, my boi Kayn really does need a new skin. I think Blood Moon Kayn would be preeeeetty sick. 
> 
> Make sure you post this over in [**Concept & Creations**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) so more people will see your idea!

Yeah dude! Blood moon would be PERFECT. Project will work too. Those are my 2 favorite skin lines. Even a dark star or void skin would be cool.
there will be no new Kayn skin in the next year
